name: Gordon Ramsay
bio: Gordon Ramsay is a British chef, restaurateur, writer, and television personality. He is known for his fiery temper and his innovative approach to cooking.

recipes.name: Beef Wellington
recipes.making_details: Season a beef fillet, wrap it in puff pastry with a layer of mushrooms and liver pate, and bake until golden brown.

recipes.name: Truffle Mac and Cheese
recipes.making_details: Cook macaroni, mix with a sauce of butter, cream, and cheddar cheese, and add chopped truffle for a luxurious touch.

recipes.name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
recipes.making_details: Make a sponge cake with dates and drizzle with a toffee sauce made with butter, cream, and sugar.

name: Ina Garten
bio: Ina Garten is an American chef, author, and television personality. She is known for her simple, elegant recipes that emphasize fresh, seasonal ingredients.

recipes.name: Roast Chicken
recipes.making_details: Season a chicken with salt, pepper, and thyme, stuff with lemon and garlic, and roast until golden brown and juicy.

recipes.name: Parker's Beef Stew
recipes.making_details: Brown beef chuck, carrots, onions, and garlic, then simmer with red wine, beef broth, and herbs until tender.

recipes.name: Chocolate Cake
recipes.making_details: Mix together flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking soda, then add eggs, buttermilk, oil, and vanilla and bake until moist and tender.

name: Jamie Oliver
bio: Jamie Oliver is a British chef, restaurateur, and television personality. He is known for his focus on healthy, sustainable ingredients and simple, rustic cooking.

recipes.name: Roast Beef
recipes.making_details: Season a beef rib roast with salt, pepper, and rosemary, then roast in the oven until medium-rare.

recipes.name: Fish and Chips
recipes.making_details: Dredge cod fillets in flour, then dip in a batter of beer, flour, and baking powder and fry until golden brown. Serve with fries and tartar sauce.

recipes.name: Bread and Butter Pudding
recipes.making_details: Butter slices of bread, layer with raisins, and pour over a mixture of eggs, cream, sugar, and vanilla. Bake until golden brown and set.

name: Nigella Lawson
bio: Nigella Lawson is a British food writer and television personality. She is known for her indulgent, flavorful recipes that are easy to make and perfect for entertaining.

recipes.name: Lemon Drizzle Cake
recipes.making_details: Mix together flour, sugar, butter, eggs, and lemon zest and juice, then bake until golden brown. Drizzle with a mixture of sugar and lemon juice.

recipes.name: Pasta with Marmite
recipes.making_details: Cook pasta and toss with a sauce of butter, marmite, and parmesan cheese. Serve with a sprinkle of parsley.

recipes.name: Slow-Cooked Beef Ragu
recipes.making_details: Brown beef chuck, onions, and garlic, then simmer with tomatoes, red wine, and herbs until tender. Serve over pasta with parmesan cheese.
